question.title: How can I show full options menu when keyboard is showing?
question.body:
I have an activity with an options menu and keyboard is normally showing. When user selects the options menu it only shows items down to the keyboard and user may not realize there are more options.

I tried to hide the keyboard in onPrepareOptionsMenu but even when hiding the keyboard here only part of the options menu is shown.

The screenshot shows what it looks like

  • when user closes keyboard and then selects the options menu.
  • When keyboard is showing and user selects the options menu.
  • When keyboard is closed in onPrepareOptionsMenu()
